name: D-Room
description:
GAMES CREATED FOR "JAM DUNGEON CRAWLER 2023" IN 7 DAYS WITH THE THEME : DUALITY

The goal is to reach the end of the 9 Rooms

There is no maximum delay but each room is timed and the time taken per room and total is displayed at the end. This gives the opportunity to make a speedrun of the games.

However you can lose and return to the beginning of the 9 Rooms if you no longer have endurance.

To move on to the next Room, you just need to find the 2 emblems of the current room.

Each room is built in the same way : one side Blue and one side Red, BOTH SIDES ARE PERFECTLY SYMMETRICAL so if you find a place where it is not symmetrical, CHECK IF THERE IS NO FALSE WALL !

0bjects such as torches, emblems, windows or energies are not symmetrical.

Good luck...

Sorry for poor performance optimizations, and minor bugs, I would fix them quickly

The game will soon be suitable for MacOs and Android.
Controler support will arrive as quickly.
